channel.title: Canadian Telecom News Feed
channel.description: Latest news about Rogers, Bell, Telus, CRTC decisions, and telecom trends in Canada.

item.title: Rogers Sells Data Center Business
item.description: Rogers sells nine data centers to InfraRed Capital Partners to raise funds for debt repayment.

item.title: Federal Internet Access Ruling
item.description: Canadian government upholds decision requiring Rogers and BCE to lease broadband networks to competitors.

item.title: CRTC Telecom Complaint Rankings
item.description: CRTC releases latest complaint rankings for major telecom providers including Rogers, Bell, and Telus.
